contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox city Japan |Name= Miki |JapaneseName= 三木町 |settlement_type= Town |MapImage= Miki in Kagawa prefecture en.svg |Region= [[Shikoku]] |Prefecture= [[Kagawa Prefecture|Kagawa]] |District=[[Kita District, Kagawa|Kita]] |Area_km2= 75.78 |PopDate= 2003 |Population= 29,015 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 34 |LatitudeMinutes= 16 |LatitudeSeconds= |LongtitudeDegrees= 134 |LongtitudeMinutes= 8 |LongtitudeSeconds= |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage= Flag of Miki, Kagawa.JPG |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.town.miki.lg.jp/ Town of Miki] }} {{nihongo|'''Miki'''|三木町|Miki-chō}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Kita District, Kagawa|Kita District]], [[Kagawa Prefecture|Kagawa]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 29,015 and a [[population density|density]] of 382.88 persons per km². The total area is 75.78 km². ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.town.miki.lg.jp/ Miki official website] {{ja icon}} ([http://www.town.miki.lg.jp/en/index.html English version]) [[Category:Towns in Kagawa Prefecture]] {{Kagawa-geo-stub}}
